recipe_name: Pan-fried sea bass with green bean sauce vierge
author: Paul Rankin
method: For the sea bass, heat the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat and cook the sea bass for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. For the green bean sauce vierge, place the oil and vinegar into a bowl, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well. Add the chopped tomato and stir. To serve, place the beans onto a serving plate and pour over the dressing. Place the sea bass alongside.
